on reading compounds: 薦【コモ】woven straw mat (orig. made of wild rice leaves), beggar, Manchurian wild rice (Zizania latifolia)
薦僧【コモソウ】mendicant Zen priest of the Fuke sect
kun reading compounds: 薦【こも】woven straw mat (orig. made of wild rice leaves), beggar, Manchurian wild rice (Zizania latifolia)
薦僧【こもそう】mendicant Zen priest of the Fuke sect
真菰【まこも】Manchurian wild rice (Zizania latifolia)
